attributes.action: Give a right to remain to all EU citizens living or working in the UK on 23.6.16
attributes.additional_details: EU citizens living in the UK are an economically active group. They provide a critical balance to the expanding retired and economically less active population.
attributes.background: The EU referendum outcome has created uncertainty for people who currently contribute enormously to the UK economy and public services. It will be damaging, at a critical time, if skilled, economically active, people leave the UK.
